name: Brute Force
description: For the rest of the match, each successive consecutive Punch card you play deals 110% (multiplicative x1.10) more damage than the last. This buff is lost if you play any card other than Punch.

hooks.OnPlay: if (Card != null && Card.Name == "Punch") { if (!State.ContainsKey("multiplier")) State["multiplier"] = 1.0; State["multiplier"] = (double)State["multiplier"] * 1.1; Log("Brute Force multiplier: " + State["multiplier"] + "x!"); } else if (Card != null && Card.Name != "Punch" && !Card.IsWaitCard) { Status.RemainingDuration = 0; Log("Brute Force buff lost!"); }
